responseText: Wonderful. Here's what I need done. I can manage watching over this dig site here myself, but there are two others. Can I count on you to run over to each of those and make sure that everything is tickety-boo? Keep an eye out for new discoveries, stuff that the helpers have dug up recently and such - and gather up any artifacts that you can and bring those back here to me, alright? Thanks, friend!
name: SQ_NOC_RVR_Samias_Miraleth_MartinSwift_21_Response
